chapter.title: Design Overview
chapter.para: &THIS.APPLICATION; is simple AWT application. It allows user to interact with USSD gateway just like mobile phone would. User interface mimics keypad and phone display.
Application logic is built on top of &THIS.PLATFORM; SS7 stack. Diagram below depicts &THIS.APPLICATION; top overview:
&THIS.APPLICATION; sets up SS7 stack with M3UserAgent as data source and sink for MTP layer. As such it is eligible to also serve as data source for &THIS.PLATFORM; JSLEE MAP RA and USSD Gateway.

note.para: Please refer to &THIS.PLATFORM; SS7 documentation for more details about stack setup and architecture.
